content:
TITLE: Initializing Adjust SDK with Basic Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Basic initialization of the Adjust Web SDK with required parameters including app token and environment setting.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.initSdk({
  appToken: 'YOUR_APP_TOKEN',
  environment: 'production'
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Adjust SDK
DESCRIPTION: Basic initialization of the Adjust SDK with required app token and environment parameters. This is the first step required before tracking any events.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.initSdk({
  appToken: 'YOUR_APP_TOKEN',
  environment: 'production'
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Adjust Web SDK
DESCRIPTION: Implementation example for initializing the Adjust Web SDK using the new single instance approach instead of manual instantiation.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.initSdk(YOUR_CONFIG)
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Tracking Basic Events with Adjust SDK
DESCRIPTION: Simple event tracking implementation using an event token to record user interactions within the web application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.trackEvent({
  eventToken: 'YOUR_EVENT_TOKEN'
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Tracking Events with Adjust SDK
DESCRIPTION: Basic implementation of event tracking using the Adjust SDK with an event token. This allows tracking specific actions within your web application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.trackEvent({
  eventToken: 'YOUR_EVENT_TOKEN'
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Tracking Revenue Events with Adjust SDK
DESCRIPTION: Tracking purchase events with revenue information, requiring both a revenue amount and currency code to be specified.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.trackEvent({
  // ... other params go here, including mandatory ones
  revenue: 110,
  currency: 'EUR'
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Tracking Revenue Events
DESCRIPTION: Example of tracking a revenue event with the Adjust SDK, including revenue amount and currency. This is used for in-app purchases tracking.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_4

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.trackEvent({
  // ... 必須パラメーターを含む他のパラメーターがここに移動します
  revenue: 110,
  currency: 'JPY'
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting Up Attribution Callback in Adjust SDK
DESCRIPTION: Example of initializing the SDK with an attribution callback function to handle attribution change events.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.initSdk({
  // ... other params go here, including mandatory ones
  attributionCallback: function (e, attribution) {
    // e: internal event name, can be ignored
    // attribution: details about the changed attribution
  }
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Setting up Attribution Callback
DESCRIPTION: Example of initializing the Adjust SDK with an attribution callback function. This allows tracking of attribution changes for the user.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.initSdk({
  // ... 必須パラメーターを含む他のパラメーターがここに移動します
  attributionCallback: function (e, attribution) {
    // e: 内部のイベント名、指定する必要はありません
    //attribution: 変化したアトリビューションに関する詳細
  }
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Callback Parameters to Adjust Events
DESCRIPTION: Example of adding custom callback parameters to events which will be appended to the callback URL registered in the Adjust dashboard.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.trackEvent({
  // ... other params go here, including mandatory ones
  callbackParams: [
    {key: 'key', value: 'value'}, 
    {key: 'foo', value: 'bar'}
  ]
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Callback Parameters to Events
DESCRIPTION: Implementation of adding callback parameters to events tracked with Adjust SDK. These parameters will be appended to the callback URL registered in the dashboard.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_5

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.trackEvent({
  // ... 必須パラメーターを含む他のパラメーターがここに移動します
  callbackParams: [
    {key: 'key', value: 'value'}, 
    {key: 'foo', value: 'bar'}
  ]
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Partner Parameters to Adjust Events
DESCRIPTION: Implementation for adding parameters that will be transmitted to network partners activated in the Adjust dashboard.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.trackEvent({
  // ... other params go here, including mandatory ones
  partnerParams: [
    {key: 'key', value: 'value'}, 
    {key: 'foo', value: 'bar'}
  ]
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Partner Parameters to Events
DESCRIPTION: Implementation of adding partner parameters to events tracked with Adjust SDK. These parameters will be forwarded to network partners enabled in the dashboard.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_6

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.trackEvent({
  // ... 必須パラメーターを含む他のパラメーターがここに移動します
  partnerParams: [
    {key: 'key', value: 'value'}, 
    {key: 'foo', value: 'bar'}
  ]
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Global Callback Parameters Management in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Shows methods for managing global callback parameters including adding, removing and clearing them from the SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.addGlobalCallbackParameters([
  {key: 'key1', value: 'value1'},
  {key: 'key2', value: 'value2'}
]);
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.removeGlobalCallbackParameter('key1');
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.clearGlobalCallbackParameters();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Global Callback Parameters
DESCRIPTION: Method to add global callback parameters that will be automatically appended to all session and event requests. These parameters can be overridden by individual event parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_7

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.addGlobalCallbackParameters([
  {key: 'key1', value: 'value1'},
  {key: 'key2', value: 'value2'}
]);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Global Partner Parameters Management in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Methods for managing global partner parameters including adding, removing and clearing them from the SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.addGlobalPartnerParameters([
  {key: 'key1', value: 'value1'},
  {key: 'key2', value: 'value2'}
]);
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.removeGlobalPartnerParameter('key1');
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.clearGlobalPartnerParameters();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Adding Global Partner Parameters
DESCRIPTION: Method to add global partner parameters that will be automatically appended to all session and event requests. These parameters can be overridden by individual event parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_10

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.addGlobalPartnerParameters([
  {key: 'key1', value: 'value1'},
  {key: 'key2', value: 'value2'}
]);
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: SDK Mode Control in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Methods for controlling the SDK's operation mode including offline/online switching and stopping/restarting the SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.switchToOfflineMode();
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.switchBackToOnlineMode();
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.stop();
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.restart();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Switching to Offline Mode
DESCRIPTION: Method to switch the Adjust SDK to offline mode, which pauses all network requests for tracking events and sessions, except for the initial session.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.switchToOfflineMode();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Switching Back to Online Mode
DESCRIPTION: Method to switch the Adjust SDK back to online mode from offline mode, resuming all network requests for tracking events and sessions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.switchBackToOnlineMode();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Stopping the Adjust SDK
DESCRIPTION: Method to completely stop the Adjust SDK from tracking sessions and events. This halts all SDK functionality until it is restarted.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_15

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.stop();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Restarting the Adjust SDK
DESCRIPTION: Method to restart the Adjust SDK after it has been stopped, resuming all tracking functionality.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_16

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.restart();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Privacy Features in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Implementation of privacy-related features including GDPR forget me and marketing opt-out functionality.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.gdprForgetMe();
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.disableThirdPartySharing();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Implementing GDPR Forget Me Request
DESCRIPTION: Method to notify Adjust backend that the user has exercised their 'right to be forgotten' under GDPR. This stops tracking and cannot be reversed.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_17

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.gdprForgetMe();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Disabling Third-Party Sharing in Adjust Web SDK (JavaScript)
DESCRIPTION: This snippet demonstrates how to disable third-party sharing functionality in the Adjust Web SDK. This method is used for marketing opt-out and affects data sharing in a similar way to GDPR right to be forgotten requests.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_18

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.disableThirdPartySharing();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: User Identification and Attribution in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Methods for retrieving user identification (web_uuid) and attribution information.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_13

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
const webUUID = Adjust.getWebUUID();
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
const attribution = Adjust.getAttribution();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Referrer Setting and Data Residency in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Methods for manually setting referrer and configuring data residency settings.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_14

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.setReferrer("adjust_external_click_id%3DEXTERNAL_CLICK_ID");
```

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.initSdk({
  "appToken": "YOUR_APP_TOKEN",
  "environment": "production",
  "logLevel": "verbose",
  "dataResidency": "EU"
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing Adjust Web SDK with Data Residency Setting (JavaScript)
DESCRIPTION: This code initializes the Adjust Web SDK with specific settings, including the data residency option. It allows selecting the country where Adjust stores the data, which is useful for companies operating in countries with strict privacy requirements.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_19

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.initSdk({
  "appToken": "YOUR_APP_TOKEN",
  "environment": "production",
  "logLevel": "verbose",
  "dataResidency": "EU"
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Using Web UUID Promise
DESCRIPTION: Example of using the asynchronous waitForWebUUID function that returns a Promise resolving when web_uuid becomes available.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
waitForWebUUID().then(webUuid => {
  // Handle web UUID
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Handling Attribution Promise
DESCRIPTION: Example of using the asynchronous waitForAttribution function that returns a Promise resolving when attribution data is received.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
waitForAttribution().then(attribution => {
  // Handle attribution data
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Event Tracking with Redirect in JavaScript
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to track an event and redirect to an external page using Promise.race() with a timeout to ensure the event is sent before redirecting.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Promise
  .race([
    Adjust.trackEvent({
      eventToken: 'YOUR_EVENT_TOKEN',
      // ... other event parameters
    }),
    new Promise((resolve, reject) => {
      setTimeout(() => reject('Timed out'), 2000)
    })
  ])
  .catch(error => {
    // ... 
  })
  .then(() => {
    // ... perform redirect, for example 
    window.location.href = "https://www.example.org/"
  });
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Smart Banner Callbacks Implementation
DESCRIPTION: Example of initializing Smart Banner with onCreated and onDismissed callback functions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
initSmartBanner({
  onCreated: () => {
    // Handle banner creation
  },
  onDismissed: () => {
    // Handle banner dismissal
  }
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Configuring Adjust SDK with External Device ID
DESCRIPTION: Initialization with an external device ID to help recognize users across sessions and platforms, useful for user tracking and install deduplication.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_3

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.initSdk({
  // other initialisation options go here
  externalDeviceId: 'YOUR_EXTERNAL_DEVICE_ID', // optional
});
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Removing Global Callback Parameters
DESCRIPTION: Method to remove a specific global callback parameter by key. This allows selective removal of parameters without clearing all of them.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_8

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.removeGlobalCallbackParameter('key1');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Clearing All Global Callback Parameters
DESCRIPTION: Method to clear all global callback parameters at once. This removes all previously set global callback parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_9

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.clearGlobalCallbackParameters();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Removing Global Partner Parameters
DESCRIPTION: Method to remove a specific global partner parameter by key. This allows selective removal of parameters without clearing all of them.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_11

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.removeGlobalPartnerParameter('key1');
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Clearing All Global Partner Parameters
DESCRIPTION: Method to clear all global partner parameters at once. This removes all previously set global partner parameters.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_12

LANGUAGE: javascript
CODE:
```
Adjust.clearGlobalPartnerParameters();
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Adjust Web SDK via npm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install the Adjust Web SDK package using npm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install @adjustcom/adjust-web-sdk --save
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Loading Adjust SDK via CDN
DESCRIPTION: Code snippet for loading the Adjust SDK via CDN by adding it to the head tag of your web page. This enables deferred loading of the SDK.
SOURCE: https://github.com/adjust/web_sdk/blob/master/docs/japanese/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: html
CODE:
```
<script type="application/javascript">
!function(t,e,a,r,n,s,d,l,o,i,u){t.Adjust=t.Adjust||{},t.Adjust_q=t.Adjust_q||[];for(var c=0;c<l.length;c++)o(t.Adjust,t.Adjust_q,l[c]);i=e.createElement(a),u=e.getElementsByTagName(a)[0],i.async=!0,i.src="https://cdn.adjust.com/adjust-latest.min.js",i.onload=function(){for(var e=0;e<t.Adjust_q.length;e++)t.Adjust[t.Adjust_q[e][0]].apply(t.Adjust,t.Adjust_q[e][1]);t.Adjust_q=[]},u.parentNode.insertBefore(i,u)}(window,document,"script",0,0,0,0,["initSdk","getAttribution","getWebUUID","setReferrer","trackEvent","addGlobalCallbackParameters","addGlobalPartnerParameters","removeGlobalCallbackParameter","removeGlobalPartnerParameter","clearGlobalCallbackParameters","clearGlobalPartnerParameters","switchToOfflineMode","switchBackToOnlineMode","stop","restart","gdprForgetMe","disableThirdPartySharing","initSmartBanner","showSmartBanner","hideSmartBanner"],(function(t,e,a){t[a]=function(){e.push([a,arguments])}}));
</script>
```
